name: Wait !
description:
Your bro has just left and you have something to tell him.
Catch up !

Clicker | Runner Game.

Originally for Mobile.
This project was made in few days during a homemade GamJam by Team Mistral.

HOW TO PLAY :
Just tap on right to RUN and tap up to JUMP.

Rassim Kessassi - Composer
Antoine Perrenot - Art Director
Nicolas Renard - Level Designer
Marilou Renault Carraro - 2D Animation
Lilian Millers - Developer | Sound Designer
Matyas Farkas - Game Design | Storytelling
